user_query: I want to convert 200 EUR to USD on February 15th, 2023 and provide the exchange rates for USD and EUR on that date.

TaskList.description: Get the exchange rate for EUR to USD on February 15th, 2023.
Get the exchange rate for USD to EUR on February 15th, 2023.
Convert 200 EUR to USD using the exchange rate obtained in Subtask 1.
